lead_paragraph: Duquesne forward Sam Ashaolu, one of five players shot last month after an on-campus party, has begun walking on his own as he continues to rehabilitate from head injuries caused by multiple gunshot wounds.
snippet: Duquesne forward Sam Ashaolu, one of five players shot last month after an on-campus party, has begun walking on his own as he continues to rehabilitate from head injuries caused by multiple gunshot wounds.
